name: content-multiplier
description: Content Ideas Manager with AI-powered generation and multi-platform publishing

scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --prefix frontend && npm run type-check --prefix backend
scripts.type-check:report: npm run type-check:file --prefix frontend && npm run type-check:file --prefix backend && echo '====== TypeScript Type Check Report ======' && (cat frontend/type-errors.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend: No type errors') && (cat backend/type-errors.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend: No type errors')
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.lint:report: npm run lint:file --prefix frontend && npm run lint:file --prefix backend && echo '====== Linting Report ======' && (cat frontend/lint-errors.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Frontend: No lint errors') && (cat backend/lint-errors.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend: No lint errors')
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.build:strict: npm run build:strict --prefix frontend && npm run build:strict --prefix backend
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
